snippet: People who support police reform say watchdog smartphone apps are evidence of the power of tech weapons in the fight.
abstract: App developers and police reform advocates cite video of fatal police shooting in South Carolina as evidence of technology's growing power in their fight; some developers are creating custom applications to help citizens capture and broadcast interactions with police, saying it could help reduce frequency of violence.

byline.original: By FARHAD MANJOO and MIKE ISAAC

lead_paragraph: People who support police reform say watchdog smartphone apps are evidence of the power of tech weapons in the fight.

headline.main: Phone Cameras and Apps Help Speed Calls for Police Reform
headline.print_headline: Right Time, Right Place, Right App for Capturing Interactions With Police
